Description.Name: Natasha Gusev
Description.Details: Natasha Gusev, callsign "Racer" is a dynamic MechWarrior whose exceptional agility and speed set her apart on the battlefield. With a passion for high-velocity combat, she quickly established herself as a force to be reckoned with. From a family deeply rooted in the world of racing and engineering, Natasha has a need for speed and a keen understanding of mechanics. As "Racer" Her swift strikes and evasive maneuvers make her an elusive target, confounding adversaries and leaving a trail of victories in her wake.
